channel.title: What Game Should I Play Next?
channel.description:
This thread is intended for a personal inquiry as to which game I should play next (post Black Mesa, of course). But maybe it could also be a spin-off of the "What Game Did You Play Today?" thread. As I'm sure some cant make up their minds in similar situations. What with our steam lists exponentially growing and limited time.
In any case, I'm torn as to which Sp game I should play next. I've narrowed it down to these 5 (games that are on my steam list that I've never played).
Batman: Arkham City Metro 2033 Fable: Lost Chapters Hitman Blood Money Alan Wake. -------------- Oh, and also MGS: Peace Walker for ps3
Obviously some of these cant even be compared but I'm looking for the most enjoyment per time spent. Thanks for the input.

item.title: What Game Should I Play Next?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Peace Walker is probably my favorite out of that list. Alan Wake and Blood Money are good too. Arkham City was too samey for me- Arkham Asylum was great, though.

Read full topic
item.source: What Game Should I Play Next?
